name: Air Bud: Golden Receiver
tagline: Story of a golden retriever who can play football.

name: Kinsey

production.name: N1 European Film Produktions GmbH & Co. KG

tagline: A look at the life of Alfred Kinsey, a pioneer in the area of human sexuality research, whose 1948 publication "Sexual Behavior in the Human Male" was one of the first recorded works that saw science address sexual behavior.

name: Xanadu
tagline: The story of a girl who makes dreams come true.

name: From Dusk Till Dawn
tagline: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in an establishment populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

name: House of the Dead

production.name: Boll Kino Beteiligungs GmbH & Co. KG

tagline: A group of teens arrive on an island for a rave--only to discover the island has been taken over by zombies. The group takes refuge in a house where they try to survive the night.

name: Sorority Boys

production.name: Morra, Brezner, Steinberg and Tenenbaum Entertainment (MBST)

tagline: Three rowdy college students are kicked out of their dorm and dress up in drag to live in the DOG house, where the girls deemed unattractive live.

name: You So Crazy
tagline: Stand up comedy by Martin Lawrence, filmed in the Majestic Theater in New York City. Martin Lawrence talks about everything from racism, to relationships, to his childhood.

name: Win Win
tagline: A struggling lawyer and volunteer wrestling coach's chicanery comes back to haunt him when the teenage grandson of the client he's double-crossed comes into his life.

name: Facing the Giants
tagline: A losing coach with an underdog football team faces their giants of fear and failure on and off the field to surprising results.

name: The Great Raid
tagline: Taking place towards the end of WWII, 500 American Soldiers have been entrapped in a camp for 3 years. Beginning to give up hope they will ever be rescued, a group of Rangers goes on a dangerous mission to try and save them.

name: Cyborg
tagline: A martial artist hunts a killer in a plague-infested urban dump of the future.

name: Henry V
tagline: The gritty adaption of William Shakespeare's play about the English King's bloody conquest of France.

name: Bats
tagline: Genetically mutated bats escape and it's up to a bat expert and the local sheriff to stop them.

name: The Fountain
tagline: Spanning three parallel stories over a millennium, 'The Fountain' is a story of love, death, spirituality, and the fragility of our existence in this world.

name: Hoodwinked Too! Hood vs. Evil
tagline: Red Riding Hood is training in the group of Sister Hoods, when she and the Wolf are called to examine the sudden mysterious disappearance of Hansel and Gretel.

name: Brokedown Palace
tagline: Two women are arrested for smuggling while vacationing in Thailand.

name: Prom
tagline: A group of teenagers get ready for their high school prom.

name: Swimming Pool
tagline: A British mystery author visits her publisher's home in the South of France, where her interaction with his unusual daughter sets off some touchy dynamics.

name: In the Mix
tagline: A successful DJ manages to rescue a powerful mobster one night. In order to repay him, the mobster gives him the task of protecting his daughter.

name: Possession
tagline: A pair of literary sleuths unearth the amorous secret of two Victorian poets only to find themselves falling under a passionate spell.

name: The Man with Two Brains
tagline: Steve Martin comedy about brain transplantation.

name: Lovesick
tagline: A psychiatrist who falls in love with a patient is visited by the spirit of Sigmund Freud, who gives him advice on how to handle it.

name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
tagline: A journalist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing -- or dead -- for forty years by a young female hacker.

name: Knock Off
tagline: Action star Jean Claude Van Damme plays a fashion designer who must join forces with a C.I.A. agent to combat terrorism.

name: Shakedown
tagline: A legal attorney and renegade cop team up to stop a corrupt cop.

name: Boiling Point
tagline: A pair of sociopath killers take on the police and the mob in order to make one last big score.

name: Spirited Away
tagline: In the middle of her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and monsters; where humans are changed into animals; and a bathhouse for these creatures.

name: Cry_Wolf
tagline: Eight unsuspecting high school seniors at a posh boarding school, who delight themselves on playing games of lies, come face-to-face with terror and learn that nobody believes a liar - even when they're telling the truth.

name: Godzilla 2000
tagline: Godzilla saves Tokyo from a flying saucer that transforms into the beast Orga.

name: A Little Princess
tagline: A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing and is presumed dead.

name: Next Day Air
tagline: Two inept criminals are mistakenly delivered a package of cocaine and think they've hit the jackpot, triggering a series of events that changes ten people's lives forever.

name: Lucky Numbers
tagline: A television weatherman scams a local lottery.

name: Penelope
tagline: A modern romantic tale about a young aristocratic heiress born under a curse that can only be broken when she finds true love with "one who will love her faithfully."

name: The Unbearable Lightness of Being
tagline: In 1968, a Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.

name: Bratz
tagline: During their first year of high school, four best girlfriends face off against the domineering student body president who wants to split them up into different social cliques.

name: Buddy
tagline: An eccentric socialite raises a gorilla as her son.

name: The Big Doll House
tagline: Beautiful women prisoners are abused in a Philippine prison, until 5 of them plot an escape by taking the evil female warden hostage with the reluctant help of 2 male fruit vendors.

name: The Swarm
tagline: A huge swarm of deadly African bees spreads terror over American cities by killing thousands of people.

name: Sunset Park
tagline: A white school teacher takes over a talented, but undisciplined black high school basketball team and turns them into a winning team.

name: Dirty Work
tagline: A loser finds success in the revenge-for-hire business.

name: Criminal Law
tagline: Oldman plays a lawyer who defends a killer, but, soon after he wins he finds out that the killer is guilty.

name: Murphy's Law
tagline: An action-packed thriller starring Charles Bronson as Jack Murphy, a cop who is running to stay alive long enough to even the score with his wife's killer.

name: Brazil
tagline: A bureaucrat in a retro-future world tries to correct an administrative error and himself becomes an enemy of the state.

name: Night Falls on Manhattan
tagline: A newly elected District attorney finds himself in the middle of a police corruption investigation that may involve his father and his partner.

name: Very Bad Things
tagline: A prostitute is killed during a bachelor party and the attendees turn on each other as the wedding approaches.

name: The Black Stallion Returns
tagline: A teenager loses his horse in Morocco and gets him back after various daredevil adventures.

name: Jade
tagline: A bright assistant D.A. investigates a gruesome hatchet murder and hides a clue he found at the crime scene. Under professional threats and an attempt on his life, he goes on heartbroken because evidence point to the woman he still loves.

name: The Swan Princess
tagline: A power hungry sorcerer transforms a princess into a swan by day in this tale of everlasting love.

name: The Hidden
tagline: An alien is on the run in America, it kills everything and uses the body to hide itself. This alien has a goal in life: Power. Hotly pursued by alien, lots of innocent people die in the chase.

name: Everyone Says I Love You
tagline: A New York girl sets her father up with a beautiful woman in a shaky marriage while her half sister gets engaged.

name: Blue Valentine
tagline: The film centers on a contemporary married couple, charting their evolution over a span of years by cross-cutting between time periods.

name: SpaceCamp
tagline: The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidently launched into orbit.

name: Dudley Do-Right
tagline: Inept Canadian mountie Dudley Do-Right chases after villian Snidely Whiplash and woos girlfriend Nell Fenwick.

name: The Baby-Sitters Club
tagline: It's the story about seven very different best friends, and one summer that will bring them together like never before.

name: S1m0ne
tagline: A producer's film is endangered when his star walks off, so he decides to digitally create an actress to substitute for the star, becoming an overnight sensation that everyone thinks is a real person.

name: Shall We Dance?
tagline: A successful but unhappy Japanese accountant finds the missing passion in his life when he begins to secretly take ballroom dance lessons.

name: Rendition
tagline: A CIA analyst questions his assignment after witnessing an unorthodox interrogation at a secret detention facility outside the US.

name: Duplex
tagline: A young couple has a chance to move into a gorgeous duplex in the perfect New York neighborhood. All they have to do is bump off the current tenant, a cute little old lady.

name: I Don't Know How She Does It
tagline: A comedy centered on the life of Kate Reddy, a finance executive who is the breadwinner for her husband and two kids.

name: Belly
tagline: A pair of vicious black gangsters have spiritual awakenings.

name: Digimon: The Movie
tagline: Three different stories involving digital creatures collide together.

name: Wrongfully Accused
tagline: Ryan Harrison is framed for murder and must prove himself innocent by finding a mysterious one-eyed, one-armed, one-legged man after escaping from a bus accident on the way to jail.

name: Lady Sings the Blues
tagline: The story of the troubled life and career of the legendary Jazz singer, Billie Holiday.

name: On the Waterfront
tagline: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

name: The Express
tagline: A drama based on the life of college football hero Ernie Davis, the first African-American to win the Heisman Trophy.

name: The Spanish Prisoner
tagline: An employee of a corporation with a lucrative secret process is tempted to betray it. But there's more to it than that.

name: The Dark Half
tagline: A writer's fictional alter-ego wants to take over his life...at any price.

name: Scenes from a Mall
tagline: On their 16th anniversary a married couple's trip to a Beverly Hills mall becomes the stage for personal revelations and deceptions.

name: Matinee
tagline: A small-time film promoter releases a kitschy horror film during the Cuban Missile Crisis.

name: Fair Game
tagline: CIA operative Valerie Plame discovers her identity is allegedly leaked by the government as payback for an op-ed article her husband wrote criticizing the Bush administration.

name: Death Sentence
tagline: Nick Hume is a mild-mannered executive with a perfect life, until one gruesome night he witnesses something that changes him forever. Transformed by grief, Hume eventually comes to the disturbing conclusion that no length is too great when protecting his family.

name: The Wild Life
tagline: Eighties teen romp involving Bill and his new apartment, Jim and his rebellious antics, Tom and his crazy self, and Anita with her older man David.

name: Smart People
tagline: Into the life of a widowed professor comes a new love and an unexpected visit from his adopted brother.

name: Chaplin
tagline: A film about the troubled and controversial life of the master comedy filmmaker.

name: Bullet to the Head
tagline: After watching their respective partners die, a New Orleans hitman and a Washington D.C. detective form an alliance in order to bring down their common enemy.

name: Conan the Barbarian
tagline: A vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to avenge his tribe and his parents whom were slain by an evil sorcerer and his warriors when he was a boy.

name: The Red Violin
tagline: A perfect red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.
